name: Squid Game Guards
description:
This is simplified imagination of the guard characters of the popular Netflix show, Squid Games, made completely in Figma. This is just a blend of gradients, drop shadows and inner shadows used in various combinations. I have used scenes of the show and renders of other similar artistic representations as references before making them.


Share and spread the love!

If you have any suggestions/inputs/ideas, please feel free to reach out to me.
